isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - (EDL) ENGINE DATA LINE WITH ALLISON AT/MT TRANSMISSION - CLOSED THROTTLE MODE OPERATION

svcproc.title: CLOSED THROTTLE MODE OPERATION
svcproc.para: In the Closed Throttle Mode, ECM pin 56 is LOW (0 volts) and Transmission Shift Modulator (404) is not energized. When ECM pin 56 is LOW (0 volts), circuit 97F grounds the Modulator Shift Control Relay control coil causing the relay to energize, opening the normally closed (N.C.) contacts (30 to 87A) in relay, TURNING OFF the power to the Transmission Modulator Shift Solenoid, which is de-energized.
